_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Paper (Super-Optimized)
author: parker@pterodactyl.io
description:
💎 Egg: Paper (Super-Optimized)
⚙️ Version: 1.1
❓ What: A branch of Spigot from Alto performance aimed at fixing gameplay and mechanical inconsistencies, but now with an optimization super path by Ashu.
🐛 Bugs fixed/changelogs:
 • (1.0) Release.
 • (1.0) All done by scripts, better maintenance and updating.
🪄 What's different ?
 • Optimizations list: https://github.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs/blob/main/Paper%20Optimized
 • This Egg has several Optimizations in the default files.
 • There is a variable called Optimization that changes the boot argument which will significantly improve performance .
 📦 Docker: 
 • Compatibility with ARM64, 64x
👑 Author: Ashu
👀 Check for updates: https ://github.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
cd /mnt/server
apk --update add git curl file unzip tar autoconf automake git wget jq
curl -o install.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs/main/Connect%20(pt-BR)/Paper%20Optimized/install.sh
chmod a+x ./install.sh
./install.sh
rm ./install.sh

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description:
The version of minecraft for download. 

Leave "latest" to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default is the latest version.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the jarfile to run the server.

variables.name: Download Path
variables.description: A URL to use to download a server.jar other than those in the installation script. This cannot be viewed by the user.

variables.name: Build Number
variables.description:
The build number for the paper version.

Leave "latest" to always get the latest version. Invalid versions have The latest version defaults.

variables.name: Optimization
variables.description: Choose which type of optimization is most suitable for you.
variables.rules: required|string|in:(0) General,(1) 1GB RAM,(2) 2GB RAM,(3) 3GB RAM,(4) 4+GB RAM,(5) 4GB RAM / 4threads / 4cores,(6) 8+GB RAM / 8threads / 4cores,(7) 12+GB RAM
